forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 4am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers between 4am and 5am, then a chance of rain showers and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a low around 50. South wind around 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers and patchy fog before 3pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. South wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In the early hours of this winter morning, Boston drapes itself in a shroud of fog, a tepid veil that softens the edges of the city and adds a touch of mystery to the familiar. As the clock ticks past three, the low temperatures linger around 50 degrees, accompanied by a gentle south wind whispering through the streets. With a chance of rain teasing the air, you may feel the first hints of dampness as the night wanes. The atmosphere carries the scent of impending rain, a reminder that nature is never quite settled, always shifting in the dance of the seasons.

As dawn beckons, expect a day where the clouds will thicken and scatter scattered rain showers accompanied by that same film of fog. The high will flirt with 57 degrees before the chill moves in, dropping as the afternoon unfolds. Stronger gusts weave through the city, urging a briskness that suggests dressing warmly and in layers to navigate the damp chill comfortably. As you contemplate your day, consider seeking refuge in the warmth of your favorite café, cradling a cup of coffee while watching the world, cloaked in mist, move lazily by. Alternatively, an invigorating stroll through Boston's quieter, fog-laden streets may unveil a serene beauty, a moment to enjoy the understated elegance that such weather gifts us. Engage in a simple pursuit of reflection, or perhaps lose yourself in a book that pairs well with this atmospheric tableau.
